original_text: And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them? as long as they have the bridegroom with them, they cannot fast.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들에게 이르시되 혼인 집 손님들이 신랑과 함께 있을 때에 금식할 수 있느냐 신랑과 함께 있을 동안에는 금식할 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Can the children of the bridechamber fast
while the bridegroom is with them?
as long as they have the bridegroom with them
